examples.text: Rights and duties are often considered <w>correlative</w> concepts in law.
The study demonstrates the <w>correlative</w> relationship between education levels and income.

senses.sense_definition: Either of two things that are mutually related or corresponding.

examples.text: In this philosophical system, every right has a duty as its <w>correlative</w>.
The author sought a visual <w>correlative</w> for the character's internal emotion.

senses.sense_definition: A word or grammatical form that corresponds to another, often used in pairs.

examples.text: In the phrase 'neither... nor', the two words function as <w>correlatives</w>.
The student memorized the table of <w>correlatives</w> for the exam.
